content.body: We don’t seem to have any where a definition of what _“transient activation”_ or _“transient user activation”_ is.

content.body: I mean, I developer-friendly definition (vs something for implementors that’s just implied through what’s affected by the relevant spec requirements).
Is it possible to state in one or two sentences what _“transient activation”_ actually means?

content.body: Does it mean “requires a user gesture”? Or does it mean more than that?
